turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello. I would like to place pickup order from Bella Luna's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what do you want to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need four small thin crust pizzas, all of them barbecue chicken.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sounds delicious. do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you said 4 small thin crust pizzas, all bbq chicken. did i get that order down correctly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $50 is the total. should i place the order now for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you got it, i've placed the order. it'll be ready for pick up in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you need anything else today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it. Thank you very much. Goodbye.
